text: – NHS primary health care facility (reprovision and expansion) – Primary school – Community centre – Transport interchange z Redevelop and improve the town centre with an anchor supermarket and a range of retail, leisure and community uses with sizes which can support independent providers. A new supermarket should be provided before the existing supermarket is redeveloped to ensure a continued service for local people. Within the town centre, active frontages and town centre uses should predominate at ground level. z Delivery of new routes and the public square should be prioritised within the phasing timetable.
